text: Yuri Oganessian ( ; born 14 April 1933) is a Russian nuclear physicist. He is considered a leader on the subject of superheavy elements. The chemical element oganesson (atomic number 118) is named after him. He is one of only two people who was still alive when a chemical element was named after him. The other was Glenn Seaborg, after whom seaborgium is named. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia Category:1933 births Category:Russian physicists Category:Armenian scientists Category:Nuclear physicists Category:Living people
title: Yuri Oganessian
